{"rule":"SOME_OF_THE","sentence":"^\\QThe Obscuring Torus: A region of dust and gas surrounding the accretion disk, which absorbs some of the radiation and re-emits it in the infrared.\\E$"}
{"rule":"PRP_VB","sentence":"^\\QSeyfert I galaxies are observed face-on, while Seyfert II galaxies are observed edge-on.\\E$"}
